messages.title: It's a hung parliament – or a Conservative majority. Your local vote will decide it
messages.content: A Lib Dem-Conservative coalition is not an option. So your local vote will decide. Another hung parliament – or a Conservative majority.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Brexit done with a deal; Making Brexit work for the Royal Town
£33.9 billion extra for the NHS; 40 new hospitals across the country
20,000 extra police officers for safer streets
More funding for every pupil in every school
£3.6 billion to help towns invest and attract new businesses; Gigabit broadband for the whole country
Ending our contribution to global warming by 2050
Regenerate our Town Centre, Save our Police Station, Fight for our Royal Park, Stand up to the Developers, Hold the City Council to the commitment they made for more devolution

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Jeremy Corbyn, Jo Swinson, Nicola Sturgeon
